attributes.action: undertake, on behalf of the beseiged taxpayers of this country, not to take in any more foreigners (those who are not UK citizens) who have been  arrested by a foreign power (other than the UK) in a foreign country (other than  the UK) like Binyam Mohamed who is an Ethiopian citizen who is being allowed to run rings around the government of this country, because he once visited here!
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: Anyone who actually needs any elucidation over what this foreign criminal is being allowed to get away with by our scottish cabinet needs to get a life!

reasons: Language which is offensive, intemperate, or provocative
